document.forum_title: Latest Europe News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Erdoğan blames Islamic State for Gaziantep wedding attack
document.topic_text: Erdoğan blames Islamic State for Gaziantep wedding attack Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 3 hours ago ) A suicide bomber aged between 12 and 14 carried out the attack on a wedding party in the Turkish city of Gaziantep on Saturday (20 August) that killed at least 51 people, the president said. Attack That Killed 51 Was Child Bomber's Fault Says President Erdogan 00:45 According to Turkish President Erdogan, the deadly bombing of a Turkish wedding was carried out by a young child. The President's announcement says that the bomber in the southern Turkish city of Gaziantep was actually a suicide bomber between 12 and 14 years old. The targeted wedding bombing left at... Recent related news The Turkish president says so-called Islamic State is likely to have carried out a bomb attack on a Kurdish wedding in Gaziantep which killed 30 people. BBC News
